description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT...and such a long description that shows the contents of the tender description in english.
full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice for Inflatable One-Person Life Raft

#### Tender Information
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Solicitation Number | W8485-258266/A |
| Publication Date | 2024-07-11 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-07-26T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-07-29 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2025-03-31 |

#### Contract Award Overview
The Department of National Defence intends to award a contract to supply Inflatable One-Person Life Rafts. Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, bid submissions are encouraged to be made electronically via the epost Connect service.

#### Contract Details
The contract is for the delivery of 40 Inflatable One-Person Life Rafts (NSN: 4220-21-846-5885) to the 25 Canadian Forces School of Survival, Evasion, Resistance, and Escape (CFSD) Montreal by January 2025. Bidder's are required to propose either an Equivalent or a Substitute Product, providing brand name and model, or Part Number and the NCAGE.

#### Tender Documents
Documents may be submitted in either English or French, the two official languages of Canada. A solicitation document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42090/w8485-258266-a---life-raft%2C-inflatable-one-person-acan.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42090/w8485-258266-a---life-raft%2C-inflatable-one-person-acan.pdf)

#### Contact Information
For any inquires or questions, please contact:
- Name: Dany Lebel
- Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Procurement Category and Trade Agreements
The Procurement Category is GD, and the tender is open to suppliers within the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free
